text: @parscale @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump So the message you’re sending is... “Trump bungled the COVID-19 pandemic response, so now let’s remind everyone about that?” Wow. That seems odd, but you should go with it, BRAD. @GOP @VP @PressSec  @GOPChairwoman
